jobInfo.Jobdescription:
·      Drive QE test and automation strategy across test pillars for SASE’s control and dataplane feature and services

·      Ability to perform test automation using customer framework (based on python language)

·      Being competent with SASE’s deployment, high level design and QE testing and automation environment

·      Focus on testing new Platform for ruggedized mobile edge, with emphasis on LTE and Wifi driver.

·      Work closely with Development engineering, Support and Tech Ops to provide day-to-day operations for the SASE portfolio.

·      Daily make hands on changes in SASE/SDWAN automation framework using Python scripting for Customer representative System testbeds 


Must Have:  Functional testing experience in network domain – LTE & WiFI protocol testing  Test automation using Python, Python scripting, Familiarity with development life cycle and Tech Ops
jobInfo.Specialization: Network domain – LTE & WiFI protocol testing
